timeline.message: fix(TBD-10983/TBD-11174): add log4j libs in 'build-in' hdp 3.1.4

timeline.bodyText: Same a previous comment. Is it useful to put back log4j2 also ?

timeline.bodyText: As I understand missing class org.apache.commons.logging.Logfactory is from commons-logging. Is it useful to put back log4j also ?
timeline.author: lbourgeois
